title: Lake Meredith National Recreation Area: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do        There are many activities to enjoy here at Lake Meredith, such as hiking, birdwatching, camping, swimming, hunting, horseback riding, boating, and fishing. We also offer ranger-guided hikes and education programs. Hikers along the Canadian River on the Mullinaw Trail.
